title: Ep 359 | Miss Kay Loves to Give Away Phil’s Money & Willie’s Outrageous Antics with His Family
description:
Miss Kay is the Queen of Fake News when it comes to family gossip. Phil shares the latest example of his wife's hilarious butchery of the English language. Jase tells the story of a God-orchestrated encounter with the hardest-working hotel employee he's ever seen. The Robertsons are big fans of tipping, but when Zach had a job at a restaurant, Willie made him WORK for his tip. And Al talks about what Jesus' disciples didn't quite get.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
